description: Reads a FreeSurfer annotation file and outputs an equivalent ROI file and/or a colormap file for use with SUMA.

hemi.title: Hemisphere
hemi.description: Specify hemisphere. HEMI is one of lh or rh. Program guesses by default.

fscmap.title: Freesurfer Colormap File
fscmap.description: Get the colormap from the Freesurfer colormap file CMAPFILE. Colormaps inside the ANNOTFILE would be ignored.

fscmap_range.title: Freesurfer Colormap Range
fscmap_range.description: CMAPFILE contains multiple types of labels. The annotation values in ANNOTFILE can map to multiple labels if you do not restrict the range with iMin and iMax.

fsversion.title: Freesurfer Version
fsversion.description: VER is the annotation file vintage. Choose from 2009 or 2005.

show_fscmap.title: Show Freesurfer Colormap Flag
show_fscmap.description: Show the info of the colormap in the ANNOT file.

dset.title: NIML Dataset
dset.description: Write the annotation and colormap as a niml formatted Label Dset.
